results.content:
The course provides a high level overview about cloud computing.
The slides ar ok, but a for my taste a bit to rigid.
The part about deployment and service models is the best one, as it provides the most valuable information.
To be honest, I think all this informations can be found on Youtube or as PDF / Whitepapers in the Internet.
There was nothing really insightful.
I've paid the reduced price (which seems always to be reduced) and so it is ok - but it was quite a bit worse than I've expected, becauseit it was didactically rather mediocore.
results.content_html:
The course provides a high level overview about cloud computing.
The slides ar ok, but a for my taste a bit to rigid.
The part about deployment and service models is the best one, as it provides the most valuable information.
To be honest, I think all this informations can be found on Youtube or as PDF / Whitepapers in the Internet.
There was nothing really insightful.
I've paid the reduced price (which seems always to be reduced) and so it is ok - but it was quite a bit worse than I've expected, becauseit it was didactically rather mediocore.

results.content:
Inhalt: Der Kurs ist wirklich nicht mehr als ein Startpunkt für weitere Aktivitäten in Sachen Cloud. Nach m.E.  fehlt die Ableitung der "Traditional IT" in die Cloud.
Quiz: Zu Banal, allerdings stehen die Fragen tlw. in keinem Zusammenhang zu den Lerninhalten.
Form: Es werden hauptsächlich nur die Folien vorgelesen. Die Untertitel sind in einer sehr schlechten Qualität.
results.content_html:
Inhalt: Der Kurs ist wirklich nicht mehr als ein Startpunkt für weitere Aktivitäten in Sachen Cloud. Nach m.E. fehlt die Ableitung der "Traditional IT" in die Cloud.
Quiz: Zu Banal, allerdings stehen die Fragen tlw. in keinem Zusammenhang zu den Lerninhalten.
Form: Es werden hauptsächlich nur die Folien vorgelesen. Die Untertitel sind in einer sehr schlechten Qualität.

results.content:
Typos found in slides.
Speaker is a poor communicator and makes grammatical mistakes.
The concepts of traditional IT is grossly simplified. 
The first module is not geared towards professionals of any kind. BAs or  IT professionals. I would not even show this to High Schoolers.

results.content: The first two sections of the course is interesting and relevant (introduction to cloud computing, comparing traditional IT setups vs Cloud Computing), however the last half of the course feels less relevant (comparing cloud providers and training/certifications for each of those providers). In addition the pace of the course is quite slow and the narrators mostly reads off the slides (slowly). Lastly the quiz asks questions about things not spoken about during the course, which feels like it's meant to catch you out...
results.content_html: The first two sections of the course is interesting and relevant (introduction to cloud computing, comparing traditional IT setups vs Cloud Computing), however the last half of the course feels less relevant (comparing cloud providers and training/certifications for each of those providers). In addition the pace of the course is quite slow and the narrators mostly reads off the slides (slowly). Lastly the quiz asks questions about things not spoken about during the course, which feels like it's meant to catch you out...
